meta_title: DSP Multicap Fund Direct   Growth - Groww
meta_desc: DSP Multicap Fund Direct   Growth is Multi Cap Equity mutual fund with risk-reward rating of null/10. It has track record of 0 years, with three year return of null. Risk is Very High
exit_load: Exit load of 1%, if redeemed within 12 months.
description: The scheme seeks to seek to generate long-term capital appreciation from a portfolio of equity and equity related securities across market capitalization.

amc_info.name: DSP Mutual Fund
amc_info.address: NATRAJ, Office No. 302-3rd Floor-Plot No. 194, MV Road JunctionWestern Express Highway, Andheri East Mumbai 400069
amc_info.description: DSP BlackRock Mutual Fund started their mutual fund on 16/12/1996 and its managing total assets of â‚¹78,763 Cr. Its ranked at 9 as per total assets at end of 30th Sep 2017.
amc_info.more_description:
DSP group is a financial firm with a legacy of 152 years. It has a been in the asset management avenue for over 20 years now and the group is headed by Mr.Hemendra Kothari.

DSP Investment Managers Pvt. Ltd. is the Asset management Company and DSP Trustee Pvt. Ltd, acts as the trustee of the AMC. The company believes that by using adequate investment strategies, it is relatively easy to be successful in the financial market. It provides a wide range of mutual fund scheme ranging from equity, debt, tax and hybrid. The AMC has always managed to keep the returns consistent and they have a brilliant investor base as well.

The AMC believes in taking measured risks, which ultimately results in understanding the market conditions better and makes the best use of the investment opportunity. With a robust variety of products and consistent performance, DSP mutual fund has made a name for itself in the mutual fund industry.

category_info.category_helper_text: Invests in stocks as per Contrarian investment strategy
category_info.tax_impact: If you redeem within one year, returns are taxed at 20%. If you redeem after one year, returns exceeding Rs 1.25 lakh in a financial year are taxed at 12.5%.
category_info.description: Contra funds follow Contrarian strategy which means investing in stocks in contrast to the prevailing sentiment. Minimum investment in equity is 65%.

holdings.company_name: Nippon Life India Asset Management Ltd.
Power Grid Corporation Of India Ltd.

fund_manager_details.education: Mr. Dagli has done B. COM and Chartered Accountant.
fund_manager_details.experience: Prior to joining DSP Mutual Fund, he has worked with HDFC AMC, Aviva India Life Insurance Company Ltd., ICICI Securities Ltd., Pioneer Invest Corp, Deutsche Equities, Citigroup Global Markets.
